CodeGenÂ¶

struct asmjit::CodeGen
#include <codegen.h>

Abstract class inherited by Assembler and Compiler.

Public Functions

ASMJIT_API CodeGen(BaseRuntime * runtime)

Create a new CodeGen instance.

ASMJIT_API ~CodeGen()

Destroy the CodeGen instance.

BaseRuntime * getRuntime()

Get runtime.

bool hasLogger()

Get whether the code generator has a logger.

BaseLogger * getLogger()

Get logger.

ASMJIT_API Error setLogger(BaseLogger * logger)

Set logger to logger.

uint32_t getArch()

Get target architecture.

uint32_t getRegSize()

Get default register size (4 or 8 bytes).

Error getError()

Get last error code.

ASMJIT_API Error setError(Error error, const char * message = NULL)

Set last error code and propagate it through the error handler.

void clearError()

Clear the last error code.

ErrorHandler * getErrorHandler()

Get error handler.

ASMJIT_API Error setErrorHandler(ErrorHandler * handler)

Set error handler.

Error clearErrorHandler()

Clear error handler.

ASMJIT_API bool hasFeature(uint32_t feature)

Get code-generator feature.

ASMJIT_API Error setFeature(uint32_t feature, bool value)

Set code-generator feature to value.

uint32_t getOptions()

Get options.

void setOptions(uint32_t options)

Set options.

uint32_t getOptionsAndClear()

Get options and clear them.

void _purge()

Called by clear() and reset() to clear all data used by the code generator.

void * make()

Make is a convenience method to make and relocate the current code into the associated runtime.

What is needed is only to cast the returned pointer to your function type and then use it. If there was an error during make() NULL is returned and the last error code can be obtained by calling getError().

Public Members

BaseRuntime * _runtime

Runtime.

BaseLogger * _logger

Logger.

ErrorHandler * _errorHandler

Error handler, called by setError().

uint8_t _arch

Target architecture.

uint8_t _regSize

Get the default register size of the architecture (4 or 8 bytes).

uint8_t _error

Last error code.

uint8_t _features

Target features.

uint32_t _options

Options for the next generated instruction (only 8-bits used).

Zone _zoneAllocator

Zone memory allocator.

Private Functions

CodeGen(const CodeGen & other)

CodeGen & operator=(const CodeGen & other)
